tweets.text: My 86yr old Mum lives with us, has heart failure & spent the early hours of the past 5 days struggling to breathe & has had no sleep, refusing to call an ambulance. We‚Äôve had enough now, spoke to Alison at EA & asked if anything was being done before someone dies #stopthestink

The air purifiers have started to go out to people in need. @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency  Look at this poor woman's eyes! This cannot be allowed to go on. Hang your heads in shame #capitoff #stopthestink https://t.co/g7kUIqLdzd
@fayedavies @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL Same here,w e've taped up the front door, sounds crazy but we are desperate & can't stand many more nights like last night #StopTheStink
Reducing water waste can help stop our local streams from drying up. To find out how to use less water and sign up for free expert help, visit: https://t.co/y1o9s3TMAK https://t.co/4g1Wtv6kzL

tweets.text:
At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

tweets.text: Government refuses to release environmental impact report of the Brexit lorry park in Ashford. Clearly Brexit operates under different rules. https://t.co/7pKcHJMFNW

20min wait to get through to someone this morning.. I wonder why that is @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency? #STOPTHESTINK 

Thank you to Jonathon for taking my call this morning. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UK7Ca1nlbe

@WHO You Advise ventilate rooms and open windows regularly, #COVID We in Newcastle under Lyme can‚Äôt do this as our fresh air is poisoned with rancid toxic smells omitted by local quarry. Health is being affected. PLEASE HELP US  @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @MattHancock @PHE_uk

tweets.text: @davemh72 @LoneRanger77777 @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @NadaFarhoud @rincon_p @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Their regulation of the landfill and management of the complaints has been so poor that the radius is widening & the reported health effects are worsening. So bad that @NewsNBC has requested a public enquiry into their mismanagement from @MPGeorgeEustice @StinkStopthe

@BBCPanorama @SkyNews @guardian @AnnaTurns these are the number of complaints to the EA about our houses being flooded with H2S landfill gases on a daily basis. A whole town being poisoned and struggling to breathe. 3 months into 2021 and exceeded all of 2020 #stopthestink https://t.co/rRoHgz0gA0

tweets.text: Reported the landfill stench to @EnvAgency again, filling my home, all windows/doors closed. This means no sleep for me or my partner who is a key worker and gets off shift at 3am. Disgusting. You need to resolve this. It is unbearable @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink

Anyone know why builders at Mitcham Bridge are dumping waste into the River Wandle? I recorded this today at 3:15. #wandle @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council https://t.co/czmoLpKGHd

@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @GretaThunberg Walleys landfill is an environmental disaster.  You gave @RedIndustries2 until the 30th April to sort the pollution. It‚Äôs the 12th April and it‚Äôs getting worse.  Why are you letting one company make the lives of thousands a misery.

tweets.text: New investigation - @EnvAgency (body in charge of monitoring chemical pollution in England) has pension funds with millions of pounds invested in agrochemical giants that make toxic pesticides (including some that are banned in UK) #divest https://t.co/NTgPkLzblb

Time once again to remind the @EnvAgency board about their obligations as public appointees (PA) and what the PA Code of Conduct says about things such as leadership, openness and accountability.

@BBCPanorama @10DowningStreet @cabinetofficeuk https://t.co/IP3L8GmPwj https://t.co/cuXZ7chVFg

Saw this colourful discharge coming out of the Shortlands Sewer screen on the waterworks this morning.

@EnvAgency @LDNWaterkeeper @SaveLeaMarshes https://t.co/c6yaZCa3Nl

@SianieRoo Solidarity to you too ‚ù§Ô∏è I've just gone around sellotaping towels around windows and doors to try, in vain, to prevent the odour getting in even more. I'm now booting up my laptop to report the odour to @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency and @NewsNBC. Again.

tweets.text: Please we need national awareness of the failings of @EnvAgencyMids and @RedIndustries2 as well as @PHE_uk . Our MP has raised the matter in parliament , people are genuinely getting mentally and physically ill through this . @NadaFarhoud @rincon_p @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off
@a_merrydew Sending love and solidarity to you too ‚ù§Ô∏è Hope it‚Äôs not to strong in the house tonight üôè

Thank you Aaron. @MattHancock please do not let this slide like @EnvAgencyMids have. It‚Äôs not just a ‚Äòsmell‚Äô.It is toxic landfill gases entering homes whilst we sleep! I have no pre existing conditions and sometimes after a bad night I wake up with my lungs burning! #stopthestink https://t.co/mbKE9wZiIt

tweets.text: Sending my love to the 1000s of people in Staffordshire who are in for yet another night of sleep deprivation & stress caused by Walley's Quarry landfill. As usual, the odour is so strong that it's gotten into the house. Time to hold my breath for the next 10 hours #StopTheStink

At what point I wonder does the board of the @EnvAgency get the idea, enough is enough.

 Time to go. https://t.co/M5evoU2hhT

tweets.text: Westlands is full of landfill gas again, starting to smell it in the house again so likely in for another night of health effects & no sleep. Shame on you @EnvAgency and your duplicity in this outrage on our health. Shame on you @PHE_EoEngland for not protecting our health

@AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids @MrNickKnowles this is an amazing MP who has gone above & beyond but to date a whole community & now wider areas are still suffering. Honest to God it‚Äôs a disaster in the making - in the future people will ask ‚Äòbut why did they let this happen‚Äô! üò¢

tweets.text: I may not be there but YOU are. Get your community going. https://t.co/I3xphlZkBt

@ErinBrockovich We are trying everything... 5,899 calls in MARCH alone just about our local landfill to the @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency and we are still not been listened to. No one is taking this as seriously. Our lives are been ruined.

@Vig79 @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council Thanks Ian. We are aware of the issue and have visited the site. If anyone sees any pollution into rivers please report it on 0800 807060
